site.name: AInTandem
site.tagline: Co-creation Space for Humans and AI
site.description: Dedicated to localized and specialized AI, realizing a next-generation workspace where humans and AI seamlessly share knowledge and experience.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Technical articles, project updates, and AI collaboration practices

hero.title: A Co-creation Space for
hero.subtitle:
Dedicated to localized and specialized AI
Realizing a next-generation workspace where humans and AI seamlessly share knowledge and experience.

philosophy.title: Philosophy & Goals
philosophy.subtitle: Building a personalized AI collaboration system where individuals maintain sovereignty while working together.

cards.title: AI Co-creation
cards.desc: In progress. Humans and AI working in parallel, sharing the same workspace.

cards.title: Open Source Sharing
cards.desc: Current phase. The core purpose of establishing aintandem.org.

cards.title: Community Governance
cards.desc: Future goal. Network collaboration based on personal knowledge and experience sovereignty.

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Complete system architecture from infrastructure to intelligent workflows.

items.title: Parallel Sandbox Workspace
items.desc: Each sandbox is an independent working environment with a real file system and project setup, not a cloud-generated demo.
list: Multi-device access: Local, laptop, or browser connection
Parallel: Human and AI operating simultaneously with synchronized observation

items.title: AI Coder / Agent
items.desc: AI in the system is a "parallel subject, but not a sovereign subject". Not a fully automated black box, but a controlled collaborative partner.
list: Autonomous action: Can operate continuously for 30-60 minutes to complete specific tasks
Reclaimable/Monitorable: Humans have final decision and interruption authority
Goal-oriented: Focused on completing specific engineering tasks

items.title: Synced Vision & Context
items.desc: Solving the problem of 'you and AI seeing different worlds'. Through the Context Manager module, humans and AI maintain fully synchronized development context.

items.title: Codebase Understanding & Reverse Engineering
items.desc: Deep analysis of existing codebases. Automatically generate architecture documentation, mental models, Call Graphs, and precise DOM ↔ React Component mappings.

philosophyDesign.title: System Design Philosophy
philosophyDesign.subtitle: What we stand for, what we are not.
isList: Real environment, real projects, real files
Long-term autonomous action but reclaimable anytime
isNotList: A flashy demo that generates apps with one prompt
Unmonitored black-box agents with destructive permissions
A product tied to a specific single model

desktop.title: AInTandem Desktop
desktop.desc: Recommended for general developers. Provides intuitive GUI for managing Workspace, Sandbox, and AI Agents.

docker.title: Docker Compose
docker.code:
git clone https://github.com/AInTandem/deploy.git
cd deploy && docker compose up -d
docker.note: Suitable for server deployment or advanced users. Please ensure Docker environment is installed.

terminal.name: Terminal Management
terminal.value: ttyd + tmux (Web terminal and multi-session management)
